txt.en: The Forges of Khazad-dûm, once a glorious smith-hall for the Dwarves of Moria, have fallen into evil hands. The Forges now serve the Orc-masters of Moria and are used to build all manner of weapons and war-machines for an assault against fair Lothlórien. Brogur and Bósi's dwarves, wishing to reclaim Moria, intend to prevent this at any cost, for they would see the Elves and dwarves reinstate old alliances for the good of both peoples.
You have failed to defeat Kranklûk within the allotted time
Defeat Narkû to alert Kranklûk of your presence

The Forges of Khazad-dûm are to the south-west of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nThe dwarf Sigurd has challenged you to fight your way to the Orc Kranklûk. Narkû, who stands between you and your intended quarry, will undoubtedly alert Kranklûk that you are coming. You will have a limited amount of time in which to accomplish your task after the warning goes out.
Defeat Kranklûk before the time runs out

Kranklûk is in the heart of the Forges of Khazad-Dûm.\n\nNarkû has been defeated, and Kranklûk is alerted to your presence. Sigurd believes that Kranklûk is the driving force in the Forges of Khazad-dûm; he wants you to defeat your foe to hinder the efforts of the Orcs.
